Field Detail

p

private static Position p
The position that this JChessBoard object contains. It is the "master" and official board.

clicked_square

private static byte clicked_square
The anchor for the start square of a user's move.

ai_colour

private static boolean ai_colour
The colour that Myriad is, true for white, false for black.

moveNumber

private static int moveNumber
The number of full moves that have been made.

gamePlay

private static java.util.LinkedList<Move> gamePlay
A linked list keeping track of all the moves that have been made.

CurrentSet

private static int CurrentSet
The current set of chess pieces that is being used. Default is set number 4.

PIXELS_PER_SQUARE

public static final int PIXELS_PER_SQUARE
The number of pixels per square. Used for painting purposes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TOTAL_PIXELS

public static final int TOTAL_PIXELS
The fixed size of the board. Used for painting purposes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

JChessBoard

public JChessBoard()
Constructs a JChessBoard object. The position is not yet initialized! The human must initialize it by getting the program to invoke one of the init() methods below. The constructor initialises the JPanel and adds the appropriate mouseAdapter for the two point click system used in Myriad.

Method Detail

init

public void init(boolean aiColour)
Initializes the board from the starting position.

Parameters:
aiColour - The colour that the engine is playing, true for white, false for black.

init

public void init(Position pos,
                 boolean aiColour)
Initializes the board from a specified position, pos.

Parameters:
pos - The position to start from.
aiColour - The colour that the engine is playing, true for white, false for black.

getEmbeddedPosition

public Position getEmbeddedPosition()
Returns the current "official" active position that is embedded inside this JChessBoard object.

Returns:
The current active position.

setCurrentSet

public void setCurrentSet(int setID)
Sets the current set with a given ID. IDs should be retrieve with ImageUtility.getSetID(String) method.

Parameters:
setID - The ID number representing the set.

displayEndMessage

public void displayEndMessage()
Displays an appropriate message that ends the game, if any messages are appropriate.

paintComponent

public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics graphix)
Overrides:
paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
See Also:
JComponent.paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics)

takeBack

public void takeBack()
Takes back the last two moves made, the changes are made in the embedded position. Note when taking back two moves, the AI's colour does not change.

paintChessBoard

private void paintChessBoard(java.awt.Graphics graphix)
Paints a blank chess board with the proper squares shaded and algebraic coordinate markings.

Parameters:
graphix - The graphics context to paint with.

paintPieces

private void paintPieces(java.awt.Graphics graphix)
Paints the pieces on the chess board with the help of the PieceImage utility.

Parameters:
graphix - The graphics context to paint with.

registerHumanMove

private void registerHumanMove(Move m)
Registers a human move to the current board, if legal. Then, the AI is commissioned to make a reply in time with multi-threading.

Parameters:
m - The move registered from the human through the MouseAdapter.
